intro: Tordylium, commonly known as the false hellebore, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Polygonaceae. It consists of several species, most of which are native to the temperate regions of the Northern Hemisphere. The plants typically have basal leaves that are alternate and often have a waxy coating.
